sections.heading: Motion; several objects authorized
sections.text: Several objects may be included in the same motion, if they all grow out of or are connected with the action or proceeding in which it is made.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 573, p. 495;R.S.1913, § 7725;C.S.1922, § 8669;C.S.1929, § 20-909;R.S.1943, § 25-909.Cross Reference
